Description
The Euro Truck Simulator 2 gives you the experience of managing the most powerful machine ever popping up on freeways, highways and autobahns in Europe. You can go all the way-from the enthusiast-truckers, to the owner of its own transport Empire. Configure the trucks from scratch as much as possible, expand your fleet drivers, hire, buy a garage in each city and explore every way-and this is only a subset of the available opportunities.

Features RePack'a:
"Masato licensed version of the game.
"No cut/no recoded anything.
"All the released DLC.
"RePack by: R.G. Steamgames.
